msg: Made XML declaration not appear by default in the <xtags:copyOf> tag

author: jstrachan
msg: Latest dom4j with neater exception warnings, only once on startup if used in a servlet container with a legacy JAXP (such as 1.0).

author: jstrachan
msg: Migrated to the new dom4j 0.3 release

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch so that XTags works on WebLogic 6.0 SP1. Its a nasty hack but will hopefully be removed later. Basically using dom4j's JAXP loading of SAX parsers seems to SEGV the JVM when running under WebLogic 6 for some wierd reason - no other servlet engine seems to suffer the same problem. Will investigate further and remove the hack ASAP
